mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, id, content, likecount, commcode, to_char(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as regdate,code FROM toon_comment WHERE code=#{code} ORDER by num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO toon_comment (num, id, code, content, likecount, commcode, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{id}, #{code}, #{content},0, #{commcode},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select id from commentlike where id=#{id} and commcode=#{commcode}
mapper.delete: delete from commentlike where id=#{id} and commcode= #{commcode}
